title: rcordr
tagline: Record activity, track progress, measure what matters

honestFraming.whatItIs: A lightweight tool for recording activity, outcomes, and metrics, and tracking progress against goals.
honestFraming.whatItIsNot: A full productivity suite, habit coach, or opinionated life system.

currentState: Free app with a very basic feature set, focused on manual recording and simple goal tracking.
seoDescription: rcordr is a lightweight productivity and self-tracking tool for recording activity, tracking goals, and measuring progress over time.
